name: Rolling Rubbers
description:
Hit the racetrack and improve your performances in this Low Poly Race Game.

Speed up your car through a variety of different tracks and improve your personal records.

From trucks to sports cars, you´ll need to master all types of cars to become the fastest in our community. 

Share with us in the comments your best times.

Will you take on the challenge to become the champion of Rolling Rubbers?
